article.title: Ostendo to Prototype 3D Holographic Workstation
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Ostendo Technologies Incorporated, Carlsbad, California, is being awarded a $58,328,021 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for a synthetic-holographic 3D workstation prototype.Â Air Force Research Laboratory, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
